articles.author: WILL WEISSERT, JONATHAN J. COOPER
articles.title: Trump taps immigration hard-liner Kari Lake as head of Voice of America - The Associated Press
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump says he’s picking Kari Lake as director of Voice of America, installing a staunch loyalist who ran unsuccessfully for Arizona governor and a Senate seat to head the congressionally funded broadcaster that provides independent news…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President-elect Donald Trump said Wednesday that hes picking Kari Lake as director of Voice of America, installing a staunch loyalist who ran unsuccessfully for Arizona governor and a… [+3185 chars]
